Interactive Photo Gallery

Technology

HTML5

Sass

jQuery

Lightbox.js

Date

10 March 2016

See the project online

Project Overview

In this project, you will create an interactive photo gallery using JavaScript and jQuery. Thumbnails and photos will be provided with descriptions.

At the top of the page you'll have a search area where photos will hide and show depending on user input. When the user clicks on a thumbnail the photo will display in a lightbox. There should be a back and previous buttons to cycle through photos.

Project details

  • Search box at the top of the page that filters photos based on the captions.

  • The photos filter in real-time as you type.

  • Includes animations when filtering.

  • jQuery plugin - lightbox.js

  • The gallery includes the ability to click on photos and view them in a lightbox.

  • Back and forward buttons when the lightbox is visible to switch between photos.

  • Keyboard navigation for browsing photos.

  • Text captions to the images when viewed in the lightbox.

Lightbox.js
